trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供的控制項陣列<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The `MaskedTextBoxArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `MaskedTextBox` array.
trans-unit.target: `MaskedTextBoxArray`類別提供對等項目執行階段功能的 Visual Basic 6.0`MaskedTextBox`陣列。

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: 它不提供 Visual Basic 6.0 控制項陣列的設計階段功能。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.target: 會需要這些只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與大幅[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]實作。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref> in a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox"></xref>中<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray"></xref>按下。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event passes an <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler.
trans-unit.target: `Click`事件會傳遞<xref:System.EventArgs>至其事件處理常式。</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 因此它只會顯示已發生按。

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: 如果您需要更多滑鼠資訊 （按鈕點選、 滾輪旋轉或位置的數目），使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.MouseClick>事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.MouseClick> event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: 不過，<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.MouseClick>如果按一下因滑鼠，例如按下 ENTER 鍵以外的其他動作，將不會引發事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: 按兩下是由使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定決定。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以設定應該才視為按兩下，而不是兩次按一下滑鼠按鍵的按一下之間的時間。

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: `Click`每當按兩下控制項時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a [control](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果您有事件處理常式`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件[控制項](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm)、`Click`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>按兩下控制項時，會呼叫這兩種方法時，會引發事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the `Click` event might be raised two times.
trans-unit.target: 如果按兩下控制項時，以及控制項不支援<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>事件，`Click`事件可能會引發兩次。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: `Enter` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: `Enter` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: `GiveFeedback`拖放作業開始時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: By using the `GiveFeedback` event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.

trans-unit.source: The `Item` property is the default property for a control array.
trans-unit.target: `Item`屬性是控制項陣列的預設屬性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 因此，下列程式碼是相等的。

trans-unit.source: ```vb# MsgBox(CStr(MaskedTextBoxArray.Item(1).Text)) MsgBox(CStr(MaskedTextBoxArray(1).Text)) ``` > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed and the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 按下按鍵且焦點在控制項時發生。

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: `KeyDown` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵事件依下列順序發生︰ `KeyDown` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用接收鍵盤事件的控制項，以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>中表單的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>事件處理方法來`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed and the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 按下按鍵且焦點在控制項時發生。

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> `KeyPress` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> The `KeyPress` event is not raised by noncharacter keys; however, the noncharacter keys do raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> events.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵事件依下列順序發生︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> `KeyPress` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>`KeyPress`非字元的索引鍵不會引發事件; 不過，並引發非字元按鍵<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>屬性，以在執行階段，並且將會使用或修改一般按鍵的子集的範例按鍵輸入。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要處理只能在表單層級的鍵盤事件，並啟用接收鍵盤事件的控制項，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>中表單的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>事件處理方法來`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項應重新調整其子控制項位置。

trans-unit.source: The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: `Layout`子控制項所新增或移除，當控制項變更，以及其他可能變更的範圍可能會影響控制項的配置時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: The layout event can be suppressed by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 配置事件，可以使用抑制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change.
trans-unit.target: 暫止配置可讓您在控制項上執行多個動作，而不需要執行的每個變更的配置。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您調整大小並移動控制項，每一項作業將會引發`Layout`事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: 發生於輸入的焦點離開控制項。

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 當您將焦點變更使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等等），或藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法，焦點事件會依下列順序發生︰ <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>當您將焦點變更使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>方法，焦點事件會依下列順序發生︰<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>`Leave`如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。 </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `MaskInputRejected` event occurs when a character is rejected by the input mask.
trans-unit.target: `MaskInputRejected`輸入遮罩所拒絕的字元時，就會發生事件。

trans-unit.source: The input mask, represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.Mask%2A> property, is interpreted by the masked text provider associated with the control through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MaskedTextBox.MaskedTextProvider%2A> property.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.

trans-unit.source: Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.MouseDown> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Click> / `MouseClick` <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.MouseUp> Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second `MouseClick` event.
trans-unit.target: 當指標通常位於圖形上按滑鼠按鈕，會引發一系列如下的控制項的事件︰ <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.MouseDown> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Click>/ `MouseClick` <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.MouseUp>關閉發生兩次按一下足夠的時間，取決於使用者的作業系統的滑鼠設定將會產生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>事件，而不是第二個`MouseClick`事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.MouseUp> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Click> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>事件是以邏輯方式較高層級的控制項事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: 它們通常會引發受到其他動作，例如，當控制項取得焦點時按下 ENTER 鍵。

trans-unit.source: A typical use of `MouseHover` is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: 典型用法`MouseHover`是當滑鼠停留 （「 停留矩形內，"） 的控制項周圍的指定區域內的控制項上時顯示工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 以毫秒為單位的指定會引發這個事件所需的暫停<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `MouseHover` event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: `MouseHover`事件定義，且與偵測到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: 發生於控制項調整大小。

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>的調整大小的控制項，您可以轉型`sender`參數<xref:System.EventArgs>資料<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>並取得其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>屬性 (或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>屬性個別)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.EventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: 若要處理自訂版面配置，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Layout>事件，而不是`Resize`事件。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Layout>引發以回應`Resize`事件，但也在其他會影響控制項的配置變更回應。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Layout>

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Leave> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Leave> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating> `Validated` If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating> and `Validated` events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 當您使用鍵盤 （TAB、 SHIFT + TAB，等等），藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>變更焦點或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>方法或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>屬性設定為目前的表單，焦點事件會依下列順序發生︰ <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Leave><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>當您在使用滑鼠或藉由呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>方法變更焦點時，焦點事件會發生順序如下︰<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Leave><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating>`Validated`如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>屬性設定為`false`<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating>和`Validated`事件都會被隱藏。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>設`true`中<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating>事件委派，通常會在之後發生的所有事件<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating>事件都會被隱藏。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.MaskedTextBoxArray.Validating> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 函式和物件中的<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>命名空間所提供的工具，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 來升級[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6>

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，這些函式和物件會複製您可以在其他命名空間中找到的功能[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 會需要這些只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與大幅[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]實作。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*>屬性值變更。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible*>

trans-unit.source: This event is raised if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A> property is changed by either a programmatic modification or user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 如果會引發這個事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>以程式設計方式修改或使用者互動變更屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Visible%2A>
